actions: Expels Wind-Cold-Dampness, unblocks painful obstruction, alleviates pain and guides Qi to the Tai Yang and Du channels.
Disperses Wind-Cold-Dampness, releases the Exterior and alleviates pain.
With Qiang Huo, for joint pain and numbness.
With Ma Huang, for Wind-Cold with anhidrosis, and body aches and pains.
Induces sweating, releases the Exterior and warms and disperses Cold pathogens.
Breaks up Blood Stasis and invigorates Blood circulation.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold and alleviates pain.
Clears Heat, unblocks and promotes movement in the channels and collaterals, extinguishes Wind and stops spasms.
Invigorates Blood circulation, dispels Blood Stasis, reduces swellings, opens the channels and alleviates pain

A possible palpable cord-like feeling in the neck
Pain, soreness and numbness of the four limbs
Maybe weakness and heaviness of the upper limbs
Severe: Withering of the arm muscles Difficulty extending and flexing the fingers Maybe complete loss of sensation and rigidity of the fingers
manifestations.pulse: Floating and moderate or Floating and tight
